name: All Snowmen Are Badguys!
description:
It's Christmas Eve and Frosty the Snowman and his evil snowmen goons have kidnapped your best elves and turned them into monsters! Defend your pile of Christmas Presents and defeat Frosty to save Christmas!

Controls:

WASD to move around, SPACE or W to jump.

E to place bombs and Q to plant trees as barriers. 

Aim/shoot with the mouse.

M  to mute all audio.

Collect carrots to spend on upgrades!

Made a few days before XMAS 2020 for a fun little project. Hope you enjoy!

Download the Mac or PC version for a better experience. Web player is known to lag a bit.

Soundtrack: https://bluehawaiian.bandcamp.com/album/all-snowmen-are-badguys-soundtrack
